Monster.Name: Werewolf
Monster.ACText: in humanoid form, 12 (natural armor) in wolf or hybrid form

Immunities.string: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered

MonsterTrait.Name: Shapechanger
MonsterTrait.Text: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Hearing and Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
MonsterTrait.Text: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
